member.name: T:Dynamicweb.WeightedSearch.ResultItem
member.summary: Represents result item with a set of properties
member.remarks: 0- Url: The url to the result, eg., link to product. This is arrSearchResult(0, x). 1- Title: The title of the search result, eg., the product name. This is arrSearchResult(1, x). 2- EditDate: The DateTime of the search result, eg., last time the product was edited. This is arrSearchResult(2, x). 3- Weight: The weight of the search result. This is arrSearchResult(3, x). 4- Summary: The short summary text describing the search result. This is arrSearchResult(4, x). 5- Description: The longer search result description. This is arrSearchResult(5, x).

member.summary: The url to the result, eg., link to product.

member.summary: The title of the search result, eg., the product name.

member.summary: The DateTime of the search result, eg., last time the product was edited.

member.summary: The weight of the search result.

member.summary: The short summary text describing the search result.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.WeightedSearch.ResultItem.Description
member.summary: The longer search result description.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.WeightedSearch.ResultItem.CompareTo(Dynamicweb.WeightedSearch.ResultItem)
member.summary: Compares current ResultItem weight with another one ResultItem weight value
member.param: The instanse of result item for compare with
member.returns: A signed number indicating the relative values of this instance and value.Return Value Description Less than zero This instance is less than value. Zero This instance is equal to value. Greater than zero This instance is greater than value.
